Title: Relates to prohibiting the release of certain balloons
Summary: Relates to prohibiting the release of certain balloons; prohibits a person from knowingly or intentionally releasing outdoors any balloons constructed of electrically conductive material filled with helium or a gas lighter than air; provides exceptions.
LawCode: Add ยง11-0331, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the release of certain balloons
